msg.data:
import java.io.File
import java.util
import com.amazonaws.regions._
import com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3Client
import com.amazonaws.services.sagemaker.AmazonSageMakerAsyncClient

paragraphs.text:
val TRAIN_DATA_DIR = "train_data"
  val TRAIN_ANNOTATION_DIR = "train_annotation"
  val VALIDATION_DATA_DIR = "validation_data"
  val VALIDATION_ANNOTATION_DIR = "validation_annotation"
  val LST_NAME = "data.lst"

  val region = Regions.US_EAST_1

msg.data:
TRAIN_DATA_DIR: String = train_data
TRAIN_ANNOTATION_DIR: String = train_annotation
VALIDATION_DATA_DIR: String = validation_data
VALIDATION_ANNOTATION_DIR: String = validation_annotation
LST_NAME: String = data.lst
region: com.amazonaws.regions.Regions = US_EAST_1
